clean_data: SQL Server Database Administrator SQL Server span lDatabasespan span lAdministratorspan SQL Server Database Administrator Bank of America Philadelphia PA Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience SQL Server Database Administrator Bank of America Newark DE January 2019 to Present Writing and Improving SQL Server and TSQL queries Responsible for providing SQL Server problem resolution and 24x7 production support and server outages Created necessary TSQL scripts stored procedures tables views functions triggers and indexes Wrote complex SQL queries using various joins unions and functions for report purpose Worked with Installation configuring and maintaining SQL failover clustering for production environments Oncall troubleshooting for SQL Server service outages Backed up master system databases and restoring them when necessary Extracting data using SQL from multiple databases to acquire statistical and financial data Collaborated with strategy Analytics Strategy Control and Initiative Execution teams for development design and execution of strategies for Collections Services department Performed complex analysis and modeling for multiple products with the goal of maximizing profit and minimizing risk Wrote SQLs to implement report specific queries in reporting Identifying and executing process improvements handson in various technologies such as Oracle and Business Objects Wrote VBAPython to create automation for ETL process Manually modified the SQL in Report Studio to tune andor to write complicated reports SQL Server Database Administrator Zenith Bank Nigeria December 2015 to December 2017 Worked with team to create administered and maintained SQL Server Database on production Test and Staging for various groups and ensured the availability of database Servers Create ODBC connection Wrote complex SQL queries using various joins unions and functions for report purpose Worked with team to develop SSIS packages to import and export data from existing systems to upgraded system Responsible for installing configuring and maintaining as per supported LOB applications Tested newly built servers for performance impact with DB load simulators Operated and oversaw database and log backups and restoration planning backup strategies and scheduling Created checklists for properunattended install of SQL Server preexisting text files and excel spreadsheets Generated the necessary BI reports and information to litigate tax appeals for properties Processed propertys annual Income and expense statement requests
